context: Cloudflare, Inc. is a cloud services and network security company focused on CDN, DDoS protection, edge computing, and Zero Trust security. Developer platform expansion. Competing with AWS, Fastly, Akamai.

competitors.name: Akamai Technologies
competitors.notes: Largest CDN provider with comprehensive edge and security solutions

competitors.name: Fastly
competitors.notes: Edge cloud platform focused on real-time content delivery and compute

competitors.name: Amazon CloudFront
competitors.notes: AWS CDN service integrated with the broader AWS ecosystem

competitors.name: Microsoft Azure CDN
competitors.notes: Microsoft's content delivery network integrated with Azure

competitors.name: Zscaler
competitors.notes: Zero trust security platform competing in cloud security space

competitors.name: Palo Alto Networks Prisma
competitors.notes: Cloud security platform with SASE and zero trust offerings

competitors.name: Imperva
competitors.notes: Application and data security including CDN and DDoS protection

competitors.name: F5 Networks
competitors.notes: Application delivery and security services including CDN
